Title: Allows installment payments upon conviction for aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle
Summary: Allows installment payments upon conviction for aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง511, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to allowing installment payments upon conviction of aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle
